import {useContext} from "react"; import AppContext from "../AppContext"; import {BasketItem} from "./BasketItem"; export function Basket({showBasket, setShowBasket}){ const {basket, deleteBasketItem} = useContext(AppContext) const total = basket.reduce((sum, el)=>sum + el.price * el.quantity,0) return
{basket.length?(
setShowBasket(!showBasket)}> deleteBasketItem("all")}>Ջնջել բոլորը
{basket.map(el=>)}
Ընդամենը {total} ֏
):
setShowBasket(!showBasket)}>
Ձեր զամբյուղը դատարկ է
}
}
